mapper.select: select count(*) from love where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and collection_id = #{collectionId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

select co.id as `id`, co.name as `name`, co.description as `description`, co.location as `location`, co.full_img_url as `fullImg` from love l left join collection co on l.collection_id = co.id where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
